N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 1000.4 - Waiver of requirements of this chapter

State Regulations

At the request of a substance abuse program, the director may
waive any of the requirements of this Chapter not specifically required by law. Such waiver request must be made in writing and may be granted only if
accompanied by documentation of substantial justification for the request and
documentation that such waiver will be in the best interests of the
clients. Notes
